TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HttpCacheVaryByContentEncodings extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供一种类型安全的方式来设置 类的 属性。

span.span: Provides a type-safe way to set the property of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用于指定是否缓存动态压缩的响应。The property is used to specify whether dynamically compressed responses are cached. 缓存动态压缩的响应，则意味着，压缩的成本只发生一次，在第一次请求资源 （或应用程序重新启动后） 和缓存项的到期时期间。Caching dynamically compressed responses means that the cost of compression is incurred only one time, during the first request for the resource (or after an application restart) and when the cache item expires. 属性类标识 ASP.NET 用于唯一标识的响应变体，如果有多个资源的缓存的响应的请求标头参数。The property of the class identifies which request header parameters ASP.NET uses to uniquely identify a variation of the response if there are multiple cached responses for a resource. 当响应依赖于一组客户端输入，如标头、 参数或内容编码时，这非常有用。This is useful when a response depends on a set of client inputs, such as headers, parameters, or content encodings. HTTP 缓存控制标头不直接相关类。The class is not directly related to HTTP cache-control headers. 但是，它可帮助确保响应客户端或代理因指定的内容编码。However, it helps make sure that a response to a client or a proxy varies by the specified content encoding. 设置缓存因内容编码使 ASP.NET 可以改变的响应将随`Accept-Encoding`标头。Setting the cache to vary by content encoding enables ASP.NET to vary the response by the `Accept-Encoding` header. 处理请求时，`Accept-Encoding`检查标头和第一个可接受编码出以及用于执行以下操作之一：When a request is processed, the `Accept-Encoding` header is checked and the first acceptable encoding is identified and used to take one of the following actions: - 如果相匹配的编码，另请参阅列表和缓存的响应存在，则发送缓存的响应。If a matching encoding is also found in the list and a cached response exists, the cached response is sent. - 如果相匹配的编码，另请参阅列表，但缓存的响应不存在，生成响应并将其插入缓存。If a matching encoding is also found in the list but a cached response does not exist, a response is generated and inserted into the cache. - 如果在找不到相匹配的编码有非编码的响应，也称为标识响应搜索列表，缓存。If a matching encoding is not found in the list, the cache is searched for a non-encoded response, also referred to as the identity response. 如果找到标识响应，则将它发送。If the identity response is found, it is sent. 否则为新非编码响应的生成，并存储在缓存中。Otherwise a new non-encoded response is generated and stored in the cache. 有关详细信息属性，请参阅 RFC 2616： 超文本传输协议-HTTP/1.1，可在上找到[World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 网站](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。For more information about the property, see RFC 2616: Hypertext Transfer Protocol -- HTTP/1.1, available on the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). 请参阅完整的详细信息部分 14 中，"标头字段定义"。See section 14, "Header Field Definitions", for complete details. 你可以设置通过使用指令或通过将配置文件添加到 Web.config 文件中的元素的属性。You can set the property by using the directive or by adding a profile to the element in the Web.config file. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何启用可从输出缓存提供的动态压缩的响应。The following example shows how to enable a dynamically compressed response that can be served from the output cache. 可接受的编码为"gzip"并通过使用设置`VaryByContentEncodings`指令的特性。The encoding that is acceptable is "gzip" and is set by using the `VaryByContentEncodings` attribute of the directive. 如果承载的网页的 Web 服务器没有启用动态压缩功能，则输出缓存将没有针对指定的内容编码的缓存的响应。If the Web server that hosts the page does not have dynamic compression enabled, the output cache will not have a cached response for the specified content encoding. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.HttpCachePolicy.VaryByContentEncodings#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpCachePolicy.VaryByContentEncodings/CS/default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.HttpCachePolicy.VaryByContentEncodings#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpCachePolicy.VaryByContentEncodings/VB/default.aspx#1)]
